about.title: About Vadatei
about.heading: Your Strategic Transformation Partner
about.p1: Vadatei was created with a simple belief: transformation shouldn't be chaotic, confusing, or overwhelming. After more than 30 years leading IT, transformation, and organizational change across HEINEKEN and Coca-Cola, we saw the same pattern repeat itself good companies struggled not because of the strategy, but because of the execution.
about.p2: That's why Vadatei exists. We help organizations understand what needs to change, support teams through the journey, and build the governance and structure that keep everything moving forward. We don't just advise from the sidelines. We've sat in your seat leading global programs, steering large teams, managing complexity, and delivering results under pressure. Our goal is to help your business transform with clarity, confidence, and long-term stability.
about.p3: We donâ€™t just advise from the sidelines. Weâ€™ve sat in your seat leading global programs, steering large teams, managing complexity, and delivering results under pressure.

hints.interimLeadership: Embed senior-level guidance directly into your organization to oversee critical transformation initiatives.
hints.implementationManagement: Directly manage the execution of departmental changes, monitoring progress and resolving roadblocks.
hints.riskCompliance: Identify and mitigate risks during implementation, ensuring processes meet legal, security, and operational standards.
hints.performanceMonitoring: Track KPIs and project milestones while providing actionable insights to leadership.
hints.stakeholderAlignment: Coordinate teams, vendors, and executives to maintain clear communication and accountability.
hints.continuousImprovement: Make iterative adjustments during execution to ensure lasting, measurable results.

hints.securityRisk: Assess vulnerabilities in your IT environment, data handling, and compliance posture.
hints.itSystems: Audit infrastructure, software, device management, and digital workflows. Identify risks, inefficiencies, or misaligned tools.
hints.peopleRoles: Review team structure, role clarity, internal communication, hiring processes, and performance systems.
hints.operationsWorkflow: Map and analyze how work gets done across departments. Identify bottlenecks, duplications, and automation opportunities.
hints.costsResources: Analyze spend vs. value, staffing levels, tool usage, and underperforming investments to highlight cost-saving opportunities.

services.sectionIntro:
Every organization approaches change differently. We provide a structured, end-to-end transformation model, from diagnosing what needs to change, to guiding implementation, to ensuring the results last.

Audit & Discovery
We conduct in-depth interviews and assessments to identify your priorities, challenges, and opportunities. This establishes a clear baseline for the rest of our collaboration.

Building a Strategy
We immerse ourselves in your business to uncover actionable steps that drive your goals forward. This stage gathers insights that guide every decision moving forward.

Roadmap
We create a comprehensive, actionable roadmap tailored to your business with implementable changes, projects, and workshops that help you succeed.

Deployment
We empower your team to own execution, providing tools, coaching, and ongoing support so improvements are implemented effectively and sustainably.

Guidance & Collaboration
Ongoing support, coaching, and mentoring throughout every phase, ensuring your team is empowered, aligned, and kept in the loop.

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Business?
cta.body: Book an initial diagnostic session to find out how we can help you transform your business.

diagnostic-deep-dive.title: Transformation Blueprint
diagnostic-deep-dive.description: Start small. Get clarity. Decide whatâ€™s next.
diagnostic-deep-dive.whatIs: A short, focused engagement to assess readiness, align leadership, and define a credible transformation path.
connectToExecution: This engagement is often used as a preparatory step for transformation execution.
The roadmap and governance created here are designed to be directly executable â€” whether internally, with partners, or through continued support.
diagnostic-deep-dive.nextStep: Short introductory call to confirm fit and discuss whether execution support is required.
diagnostic-deep-dive.subtitle: Discover the 5 hidden warning signs that most leadership teams miss and how to fix them before it's too late.
diagnostic-deep-dive.pageSubtitle: This engagement is often used as a preparatory step for transformation execution. The roadmap and governance created here provide a clear, low-risk foundation for coordinated delivery. Most clients choose to continue into Transformation Execution to implement the roadmap with continuity of context and accountability. Others use the outputs internally or with existing partners.
diagnostic-deep-dive.overview: The Transformation Blueprint is a focused, end-to-end diagnostic that reveals the real barriers holding your organization back â€” and provides a clear, actionable roadmap for improvement. It is the foundation of the Vadatei Transformation Model and the first step for organizations that want clarity before committing to large-scale change. In 2â€“4 weeks, we evaluate your operating model, processes, governance, digital capabilities, and team alignment to uncover what needs to change, how to change it, and where to begin.

whyItMatters.title: Why the Blueprint Matters
whyItMatters.intro: Most transformations fail because the root causes aren't understood. Teams see symptoms â€” slow processes, unclear ownership, ineffective tools â€” but not the system underneath.
whyItMatters.description: The Blueprint brings a structured, experienced outside view to identify:
whyItMatters.conclusion: This ensures every decision, investment, and effort is focused on the right things.

deliverables.title: What You Get (Deliverables)
deliverables.subtitle: A Transformation Blueprint engagement includes clear, tangible outputs that your leadership team can act on immediately.

items.title: Transformation Readiness Assessment
items.description: A structured review of your organization's ability to execute change.

items.title: Operating Model Evaluation
items.description: We assess roles, structure, responsibilities, decision-making, and cross-functional collaboration.

items.title: High-Level Process Review
items.description: Light mapping of key flows such as: Order-to-Cash (O2C), Procure-to-Pay (P2P), Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP), Commercial processes

items.title: Digital & ERP Impact Check
items.description: We identify gaps, risks, and opportunities related to your digital tools and ERP ecosystem.

items.title: Governance & Accountability Assessment
items.description: We review how decisions are made, escalated, and communicated.

items.title: Risk, Issue & Opportunity Map
items.description: A structured overview of bottlenecks, capability gaps, and improvement areas.

items.title: Prioritization Framework
items.description: Clear ranking of quick wins, medium-term improvements, and long-term initiatives.

items.title: Transformation Roadmap
items.description: Your first 90 days of focused action â€” clear, realistic, actionable.

items.title: Leadership Briefing
items.description: A final presentation summarizing findings, actions, and recommended next steps.

steps.title: Discovery & Alignment
steps.description: We meet with leadership to understand goals, challenges, and concerns. You decide the scope. We align expectations.

steps.title: Data & Process Review
steps.description: We analyze your existing documentation, process flows, reports, performance metrics, and org structure.

steps.title: Interviews & Workshops
steps.description: We speak with key stakeholders to understand the real-world bottlenecks.

steps.title: Analysis & Mapping
steps.description: We identify patterns, gaps, risks, and improvement areas across your organization.

steps.title: Prioritization
steps.description: We classify issues into: High impact / urgent, High impact / medium term, Medium impact, Long-term improvements

steps.title: Transformation Roadmap
steps.description: We build a realistic plan with timelines, owners, and success metrics.

steps.title: Leadership Briefing
steps.description: A structured executive presentation that gives you clarity, confidence, and direction.

lightProcess: Week 4: Alignment, refinement, and leadership briefing
howSteps: Week 4: Alignment, refinement, and leadership briefing

pricing.note: (Final scope confirmed after a short introductory call)

whatThisSolves.title: What This Solves
whatThisSolves.intro: Companies use the Blueprint when they are experiencing:
whatThisSolves.conclusion: If you feel "something isn't working" but don't know what â€” the Blueprint identifies it.

outcomes: Complete clarity on your top priorities
Understanding of what's slowing your teams down
A clear starting point for transformation
outcomesBullets: Complete clarity on your top priorities
Understanding of what's slowing your teams down
A clear starting point for transformation

examples.title: 40% performance gain
examples.description: A European distributor discovered 40% of delays were caused by unclear ownership. Resetting responsibilities fixed the issue in weeks.

examples.title: 2 months saved on ERP prep
examples.description: A manufacturing company learned their ERP challenges were due to missing governance, not the system itself. With the Blueprint, they aligned their teams and avoided a 2-month delay.

examples.title: 17% faster order-to-cash cycle
examples.description: A beverage company optimized its O2C flow after the Blueprint highlighted handover gaps and redundant approvals.

needsChecklist.title: Signs You Need a Transformation Blueprint
items: Digital tools or ERP are underused
There is confusion in roles or decision-making
Leaders do not have a shared view of the situation
You want improvement but don't know where to start
Projects feel siloed, late, or unclear
needsChecklist.conclusion: If you checked 3 or more, the Blueprint is the right next step.

whyVadatei.title: Why Vadatei?
whyVadatei.intro: Vadatei brings 30+ years of transformation leadership at HEINEKEN, Coca-Cola, and ERA Group â€” experience leading real transformations, not just advising on them.
whyVadatei.conclusion: You get enterprise-grade transformation leadership, now available for mid-sized companies.

questions.q: Is the Blueprint enough to make meaningful improvements?
questions.a: Yes â€” many clients see measurable gains from the 90-day plan alone.

questions.q: Do we need to commit to Execution after Blueprint?
questions.a: No. The Blueprint is a standalone phase.

questions.q: How many people do you interview?
Does it include detailed process documentation?
questions.a: No â€” that is part of Transformation Execution. Blueprint focuses on clarity and direction, not deep mapping.
Yes â€” a full leadership briefing is included.

diagnostic-deep-dive.whoFor: Companies preparing for growth, digital adoption, or structural change who need clarity before taking action.
diagnostic-deep-dive.example: A mid-market distributor used the Blueprint to identify unclear ownership as the root cause of 40% of operational delays. A simple role/decision fix removed the bottleneck within two weeks.

cta.title: Start With a Transformation Blueprint
cta.description: Get clarity, confidence, and a clear roadmap in 2â€“4 weeks.

diagnostic-deep-dive.fullDescription: A rapid but thorough assessment that identifies what needs to change, why, and how. We map your processes, structure, governance, and digital landscape to uncover barriers, risks, and opportunities. The result is a clear, prioritized, and actionable transformation roadmap your organization can start executing immediately.

targeted-transformation.title: Transformation Execution
targeted-transformation.quietSentence: We take on a limited number of Execution engagements at a time to protect delivery quality and senior involvement.
targeted-transformation.subtitle: Receive a proven step-by-step checklist to help you align your people, processes, and priorities â€” before launching your next transformation.
targeted-transformation.pageSubtitle: Turn strategy into disciplined, measurable change.
targeted-transformation.whatIs: Translate strategic direction into coordinated, accountable, and measurable transformation that enables your organization to achieve its goals.
targeted-transformation.overview: Transformation Execution is where your strategy becomes reality. In this phase, we redesign your operating model, optimize key processes, strengthen governance, and guide your teams through the actual implementation of change. This is hands-on, structured support â€” not theoretical consulting. We work directly with your leaders and teams to deliver a transformation that is controlled, coordinated, and measurable. If the Blueprint shows what needs to change, Execution ensures it actually happens â€” effectively and sustainably.

whyItMatters.title: Why Execution Matters
whyItMatters.intro: Most transformations fail not because of poor strategy, but because of poor execution:
whyItMatters.conclusion: Execution solves these problems by creating structure, clarity, and the right routines to move your transformation forward.

deliverables.title: What We Focus On
deliverables.subtitle: During Transformation Execution, you receive enterprise-grade tools, processes, and leadership support that drive predictable progress.

items.title: Operating Model Redesign
items.description: Clear roles, responsibilities, decision paths, and organizational structure.

items.title: Deep-Dive Process Mapping & Optimization
items.description: Detailed mapping and improvement of flows such as: Order-to-Cash (O2C), Procure-to-Pay (P2P), Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP), Customer Service, Logistics, Production, Commercial processes & field operations

items.title: PMO Setup & Weekly Governance
items.description: A structured rhythm for: prioritization, issue escalation, decision-making, progress tracking, risk & KPI reporting

items.title: ERP / SAP Support
items.description: Expert guidance on: design validation, process alignment, adoption & change, testing approach, go-live readiness

items.title: Digital Adoption Management
items.description: Ensure tools are used correctly and consistently across teams.

items.title: Vendor & Partner Alignment
items.description: We ensure all external partners deliver on commitments and integrate into your governance.

items.title: Leadership Coaching
items.description: Strengthening leadership capability, communication, and decision-making.

items.title: Implementation Guidance
items.description: We stay close to your teams, helping solve bottlenecks as they arise.

steps.title: Setup & Alignment
steps.description: We define scope, owners, objectives, and working routines.

steps.title: Operating Model Redesign
steps.description: We uncover role gaps, unclear responsibilities, and decision bottlenecks.

steps.title: Process Mapping
steps.description: We map and optimize the most critical end-to-end flows.

steps.title: PMO & Governance Setup
steps.description: We create a weekly rhythm that builds discipline, visibility, and momentum.

steps.title: ERP / Digital Alignment
steps.description: We ensure process, data, and roles match the technology being implemented.

steps.title: Leadership Coaching & Communication

We redesign operating models, strengthen governance, support ERP and digital initiatives, and guide teams through new ways of working. This service turns strategy into structured execution â€” ensuring change actually happens, sticks, and delivers measurable results.

extended-oversight.title: Transformation Leadership
extended-oversight.quietSentence: Transformation Leadership is designed for long-term partners who want consistent senior guidance, governance discipline, and steady momentum.
extended-oversight.subtitle: Transformation is only half the battle â€” sustaining it is where real value is delivered. Discover 5 tactics to make your change stick.
extended-oversight.pageSubtitle: Sustain momentum. Strengthen alignment. Ensure transformation success.
extended-oversight.whatIs: Provide consistent interim leadership to sustain transformation momentum, strengthen alignment, and ensure your strategic goals are achieved.
extended-oversight.nextStep: Short introductory call to confirm fit and review alignment with existing roadmaps or execution plans.
extended-oversight.overview: Transformation Leadership is your long-term partnership for structured, stable, and consistent transformation progress. We act as your fractional Chief Transformation Advisor, providing ongoing oversight, governance, decision support, and leadership guidance to ensure your transformation stays on track â€” month after month. While Blueprint gives clarity and Execution delivers change, Leadership ensures results last. This is the highest-impact stage of the Vadatei Transformation Model, giving your business the momentum, alignment, and discipline required for long-term success.

whyItMatters.title: Why Leadership Matters
whyItMatters.intro: Transformations don't fail at the beginning. They fail after momentum slows:
issues: Teams drift back to old habits
whyItMatters.conclusion: Transformation Leadership prevents this. It keeps your transformation alive, aligned, and progressing.

extended-oversight.fullDescription: A long-term partnership that provides continuous oversight, direction, and advisory for your transformation journey. We act as your Chief Transformation Advisor â€” supporting leadership, stabilizing programs, guiding governance, and ensuring progress stays on track. This service brings predictability, maturity, and long-term stability to your full transformation portfolio.

services.q: What kinds of organizations do you work with?
services.a: We work with small and medium-sized companies in industries such as hospitality, manufacturing, and transportation â€” particularly those undergoing growth, restructuring, or modernization. Most clients reach out when their operations or culture are no longer aligned with their goals.

services.q: How long does a typical engagement last?
services.a: Engagements typically run 4â€“52 weeks depending on the task at hand: Transformation Blueprint: 4 weeks, Transformation Execution: 8â€“52 weeks, Transformation Leadership: ongoing (monthly retainer). A precise timeline is agreed on during the Diagnostic Call.

We offer clear, fixed-fee packages based on the Vadatei Transformation Model: Blueprint: fixed project fee, Execution: fixed or milestone-based, Leadership: monthly. This ensures predictability and eliminates open-ended billing.

locations.q: Can we start with a smaller project?
locations.a: Absolutely. Most clients begin with the Transformation Blueprint, which provides clarity on priorities before committing to larger execution work.

locations.q: Do you work remotely or on-site?
locations.a: Most delivery is done remotely for efficiency. On-site workshops, leadership alignment sessions, and transformation kick-offs can be arranged when in-person collaboration adds value.

process.q: What's the first step if we want to work together?
process.a: Start with a short Diagnostic Call â€” a no-pressure conversation about your goals, challenges, and transformation priorities. From there, we outline scope, timelines, and engagement options.
You can expect clearer priorities, smoother operations, stronger team alignment, and measurable progress in how your company works and communicates.

sections.howFallback: A short introductory call confirms scope, timing, and fit. Then we align on next steps.

servicePage.nextStep: Short introductory call to confirm fit.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Vadatei ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
privacy.personalInfoText: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
privacy.personalInfoContact: Contact us through our website or email
privacy.personalInfoDiscovery: Schedule a discovery call or consultation
privacy.personalInfoIncludes: This information may include your name, email address, phone number, company name, job title, and any other information you choose to provide.
privacy.autoInfoText: We may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage patterns, including:
privacy.autoInfoPages: Pages visited and time spent on our website
privacy.useInfoText: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.useInfoProvide: Provide and improve our consulting services
privacy.useInfoRespond: Respond to your inquiries and requests
privacy.useInfoSchedule: Schedule and conduct discovery calls and consultations
privacy.useInfoSend: Send you relevant information about our services
privacy.useInfoAnalyze: Analyze website usage and improve user experience
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except:
privacy.sharingProviders: To trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business
privacy.sharingLaw: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.sharingTransfer: In connection with a business transfer or merger
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.rightsDelete: Request deletion of your personal information
privacy.rightsCopy: Request a copy of your personal information
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
